text.section: A person may not leave a cat or dog unattended in a standing or parked motor vehicle in a manner that endangers the health or safety of the cat or dog.

A person may not use force of any kind to remove from a motor vehicle:
A dog used by the State or a local governing body for police work while the dog is on duty; or
A cat or dog in the custody of an animal control officer.
A person described in subsection (b) of this section may not be held liable for any damages directly resulting from actions taken under the provisions of subsection (b) of this section.
